BNC User Reference Guide

<email>

email contains an e-mail address identifying a location to which e-mail messages can be delivered.
Class model.addressLike
Declaration 
element email { macro.phraseSeq }
Attributes
(Global attributes only)
Example
 <email
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"
xmlns:tei="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">editors@tei-c.org</email>
Note

The format of a modern Internet email address is defined in RFC 2822
Module core
